article.headline: Morgan State 63, Norfolk State 59
article.story: NORFOLK, Va. (AP) -- Tyree Spinner scored 21 as Morgan State held off Norfolk State 63-59 on Monday night. Al'Davon Thomas' jumper with 4:52 remaining tied the game for the seventh time in the second half, but Morgan State (3-20, 3-9 Mid-Eastern Athletics Conference) took the lead for good off a layup by Spinner. Tony Murphy's basket brought Norfolk State to within one, at 60-59, with 15 seconds left, but Morgan State sank 3 of 4 free throws to end the game. Morgan State jumped out ahead by eight in the first 7½ minutes. The Bears led by as many as 13, but Norfolk State (8-15, 7-6) finished the half with a 13-3 that brought them to within 32-29 at the break. Marcus Gomes scored 17 for Morgan State and Joseph McLean had 15 points and 11 rebounds. Murphy led the Spartans with 26 points and Thomas added a career-high 17.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
